title.bibl: Revyen, May 23, 1914. Experienced Danish Farmers Wanted

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Revyen, May 23, 1914. EXPERIENCED DANISH FARMERS WANTED

body.p: Cooperative dairies have been organized on some of the Governments' irrigation land, and Danish farmers who will go into this business are in demand. There are also good opportunities for general farming, truck-farming, hog-and chicken-raising, etc.

The Reclamation Service in Washington, D.C., will upon request send pamphlets and all required information and will also put prospective Danish settlers in touch with Danes who are already established on this irrigation project and with whom they may correspond.
